p: Eligible individuals were ART-naïve women, 18–80 years old at ART initiation, who started their first ART regimen between 1 January 2000 and 31 December 2014. North American participants were required to have a second visit within 12 months of enrollment, regardless of ART initiation status, so that anyone who died soon after enrollment would not have been included in NA-ACCORD. In Southern Africa, analyses were restricted to cohorts from the Republic of South Africa where patient records could be linked to the vital registry. We excluded individuals from the Asia-Pacific region [ 20] ( N = 849) as the number of deaths was very low, those from Mexico because of having too few eligible participants ( N = 100) and those from Argentina ( N = 545) as mortality was reported to be under-ascertained and no further corrections could be applied.
